OCTGN

Installing

  1. How do I install OCTGN to play Transformers?
    1. Install the app and create your account: http://octgn.net/Home/GetOctgn
    2. Open OCTGN, and go to "Game Manager" to install "Transformers".
    3. Download the card images (.o8c files): http://www.hi-izuru.org/OCTGN/Games/Transformers/
    4. In "Games Manager", choose "Add Image Pack" to upload the .o8c files into your OCTGN.
    5. Open the "OCTGN Deck Builder" and build your deck. You can also download a deck directly from https://fortressmaximus.io using the "OCTGN Export" function.
  2. Why can't I see the card images?
    You probably haven't installed the image pack. You should: 1. Download the card images (.o8c files): http://www.hi-izuru.org/OCTGN/Games/Transformers/
    2. In OCTGN's "Games Manager", choose "Add Image Pack" to upload the .o8c files into your OCTGN.
  3. Can I play on Mac OS?
    On Mac OS before 10.15 (Catalina) you should be able to use WINE to play on Mac OS. From 10.15 onwards WINE currently appears to have issues. You could also use a VM to install Windows on top of Mac OS. Note that both of these are non-simple for the average computer user, so don't feel bad if you decide not to try.
  4. Can I play on Linux?
    You should be able to use WINE to play on Linux, or you could install Windows onto Linux on a VM.
